Defiant Light

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, runepriest, Defiant Word class feature
Benefit: You gain resist 5 necrotic and resist 5 radiant. You also gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls with runepriest powers against targets that are vulnerable to radiant damage.

Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 186.
